name: FLIRCameraDriverPlugin
description: FLIRCameraDriverPlugin consumes FLIR camera pedestrian detection data and publishes it as Sensor Detected Objects used for Cooperative Perception Messages like SDSM.

messageTypes.description: Sensor Detected Object Message used for Cooperative Perception Messages like SDSM. This message is used to send detected objects from the FLIR camera to the V2I Hub.

configuration.description: A list of dictionaries containing the configuration for each FLIR camera. Each dictionary should contain the following keys: WebSocketHost, WebSocketPort, HostString, FLIRCameraRotation, and FLIRCameraViewName. Only used when "FLIR" is the selected DataProvider.
The log level for this plugin
